label: PaymentStatusType
comment: A specific payment status. For example, PaymentDue, PaymentComplete, etc.

enumerationMembers.label: PaymentAutomaticallyApplied
enumerationMembers.comment: An automatic payment system is in place and will be used.

enumerationMembers.label: PaymentComplete
enumerationMembers.comment: The payment has been received and processed.

enumerationMembers.label: PaymentDeclined
enumerationMembers.comment: The payee received the payment, but it was declined for some reason.

enumerationMembers.label: PaymentDue
enumerationMembers.comment: The payment is due, but still within an acceptable time to be received.

enumerationMembers.label: PaymentPastDue
enumerationMembers.comment: The payment is due and considered late.
